CustomField.description: Enter the number of days prior to the current date up to which actuals should be included. Enter 0 to use today as the cutoff date. Leave blank to use the default cut off date, which is the end of last week.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Enter the number of days prior to the current date up to which actuals should be included. Enter 0 to use today as the cutoff date. Leave blank to use the default cut off date, which is the end of last week.
CustomField.label: Actuals Cutoff Offset
